thig2.3:1.2: so very well freed from the pounding of the pestle!
thig2.3:1.3: My disgusting husband inflated like a mushroom,
thig2.3:1.4: my mortar wafted like an eel.
thig2.3:2.1: Now, as for greed and hate:
thig2.3:2.2: I sear them and sizzle them up.
thig2.3:2.3: Having gone to the root of a tree,
thig2.3:2.4: I meditate happily, thinking, “Oh, what bliss!”
